languages.text: During each round, the first ability the Overseer retargets via the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm restores 1 AP after use.

traits.locale_text: During each round, the first ability the Overseer retargets via the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm restores 1 AP after use.

languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Экстраполировав{/g} способность впервые за раунд, надзиратель восстанавливает себе 1 ОД.
{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Экстраполировав{/g} способность впервые за раунд, надзиратель восстанавливает себе 1 ОД.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} über den Servoschädel-Schwarm in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} erstmals {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapoliert{/g}, regeneriert er +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Aufseher eine Fähigkeit über den Servoschädel-Schwarm in einer Runde erstmals {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapoliert{/g}, regeneriert er +1 AP.

languages.text: Lorsque l'essaim de servocrânes {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapole{/g} une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de son {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} pour la première fois d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, celui-ci récupère +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque l'essaim de servocrânes {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapole{/g} une capacité de son surveillant pour la première fois d'un round, celui-ci récupère +1 PA.

languages.text: 当监{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}每{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中首次通过伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当监察官每轮中首次通过伺服头骨集群{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}传播{/g}能力时，获得1点行动点数。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapola{/g} una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} mediante el enjambre de servocráneos por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, recupera +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapolates{/g} an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} through the servo-skull swarm for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, they regain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el supervisor {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}extrapola{/g} una capacidad mediante el enjambre de servocráneos por primera vez en un asalto, recupera +1 PA.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督官{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で初めてサーヴォスカル・スウォームを通して{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿する{/g}場合、{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}を+1回復する。

traits.locale_text: 監督官がラウンドで初めてサーヴォスカル・スウォームを通してアビリティを{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿する{/g}場合、APを+1回復する。
監督官がラウンドで初めてサーヴォスカル・スウォームを通してアビリティを{g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}外挿する{/g}場合、APを+1回復する。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bir {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} hizmelet sürüsü aracılığıyla ilk kez bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlediğinde{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} geri kazanır.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, bir rauntta hizmelet sürüsü aracılığıyla ilk kez bir kabiliyeti {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}dışdeğerlediğinde{/g} +1 EP geri kazanır.
